title: MockResponses
description: A collection of mock responses to return from an endpoint

endpoints.description: Top level container for all endpoints

path.description: URL path for this endpoint. Can have multiple parts (see example values).

verb.description: HTTP verb that triggers this action. If there are multiple actions with the same verb, the first listed action will be triggered.

mode.description: Mode for selecting a response to return. Single always returns a single response (control using singleResponseIndex property). Random returns a random response (control the change of specific responses using the randomChance field in the response). Intercept prompts the user to select a response.

singleResponseIndex.description: The zero-based index of the response to return when in 'Single' response mode. If the given index is not valid, the first response will be returned.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code to return with the response

randomWeight.description: The chance of returning this specific response when in Random response mode. Weights are relative to other responses for this action (response with a weight of 2 is twice as likely as be returned as response with a weight of 1). Set to 0 for the response to never be returned in random mode.

headers.description: HTTP headers to return with the response

jsonBody.description: JSON body to return as the response
